陫字的基本解释

陫
fèi
〔陫侧〕古同“悱恻”，心中悲苦，如“隐思君兮陫陫。”
古同“厞”，隐蔽；狭隘。

陫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fěi］
［《廣韻》浮鬼切，上尾，奉。］
见“陫側”。

陫字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【阜字部】　陫； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1352第19
【集韻】蒲枚切，音裴。【玉篇】山名。　又【廣韻】浮鬼切【集韻】【韻會】父尾切，?音膹。【廣韻】?也。亦作䨾。【集韻】或作?。　又【集韻】父沸切，音費。隱也。【楚辭·九歌】隱思君兮陫側。本作厞。或作?。

陫字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
陫字的起名意思

暂无。

High
Basic explanation of words
High
fèi
〔陫边〕The ancient tongs are "Xianxun", with sorrow in their hearts, such as "Thinking about the monarch in secret."
The ancients are "loose", concealed; narrow-minded.
High
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fěi］
["Guangyun" floating ghost cut, upper tail, bong. ]
See "Zao side".
High
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【Fu Character Department】　陫; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1352 Page 19
[Ji Yun] Pu Meiqie, sound Pei. 【Jade articles】The name of the mountain.　 [Guang Yun] Floating Ghost Cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Father's tail cut,? Yin Yi. [Guang Yun]? Also. Also known as a phantom. [Ji Yun] Or make?.　[Jiyun] Father boiled and cut, sound fee. Hidden also. [Songs of Chu·Nine Songs] Reflect on the side of the king. This is 厞. Or for?.
